alert.note: Alert for Brookings (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 9:00PM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa...Minnesota... Big Sioux River at Akron affecting Plymouth and Union Counties. Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River above Hawarden affecting Lincoln, Union and Sioux Counties. Big Sioux River at Brandon affecting Lincoln, Minnehaha and Lyon Counties. Medary Creek near Medary affecting Brookings County. Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. Big Sioux River near Canton affecting Lincoln, Sioux and Lyon Counties. Sixmile Creek near Brookings affecting Brookings County. Rock River near Hardwick affecting Rock County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa... Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Moody and Brookings Counties. Rock River at Rock Rapids affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Medary Creek near Medary. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1588.0 feet, minor flooding of pasture lands begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 1588.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 PM CDT Tuesday was 1588.4 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1588.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Medary Creek Medary 1588.0 1588.2 Tue 9 pm MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by Wednesday afternoon.
